Name: 弗洛伊斯(FREUS)
About the game: 《Freus》 is a platform action game. Help the demon-possessed boy, Freus, to complete his journey of revenge. Use your strengths to your advantage and let Floys dodge through brutal, fast-paced levels, defeat powerful enemies, and make it to the end! Game Features: Fast-paced game mechanics: Freus is just an ordinary person who will collapse immediately after being attacked, try not to make mistakes, so that Freus can complete his journey unscathed. Handcrafted levels: The game contains more than 100 handcrafted levels, each of which is unique and challenging, which will test your skills! An unusual adventure: Follow in the footsteps of Freus and his friends, go deep into this conspiracy that affects the whole world, and finally decide the direction of the world. Pure hand-made pixel art: All the art materials in the game are drawn by hand, including interesting pixel-style scenes and frame-by-frame animations. Come on with Freus! (huh,if you can...)
Developers: 宇宙超级无敌老铁没毛病制作组
Publishers: 宇宙超级无敌老铁没毛病制作组
